attributes.comment:
This comment is regarding docket USCIS 2006-0044 from the US Citizenship and
Immigration Services. I am opposed to any increase in the fees for the filing of the
I-600A and Biometric services. The cost of international adoption is already
prohibitive to most families, and any increase in cost will result in fewer children
being placed in loving homes. With the lengthening of many international adoption
programs, many families will file the I-600A and have their fingerprints done
multiple times. Please do not create a hardship for these families, including my
own, that are trying to help orphans from other countries.
Thank you,
Susan Banchero
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Susan Banchero
